headline: Told to Purge Voters, Wisconsin Election Officials Are Held in Contempt
abstract: A conservative group says removing names is merely following existing rules. Liberals say the move is aimed at dropping Democrats before the 2020 election.
lead_paragraph: A Wisconsin judge held three state election commissioners in contempt on Monday and ordered them to proceed immediately with purging more than 200,000 people from the stateâ€™s voter rolls.
